channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Students Are ‘Learning with Their Feet’ — by Shunning Bad Colleges
item.description: Students are reshaping the higher education market by abandoning low-ranking schools and low-earning majors.

item.title: Supreme Court skeptical of 'conversion therapy' law banning treatment of minors with gender identity issues

item.title: Multimillionaire serial entrepreneur cried the first time she made ‘real money’—but not in a good way: ‘Wealth doesn’t erase your problems. It magnifies them’
item.description: Emily Lyons said commas in her bank account didn’t help her feel relieved, but rather scared of losing all she had gained.

item.title: ‘Big Short’ investor Steve Eisman warns the U.S. economy is a ‘tale of two cities’ that ‘is not even growing 50 basis points outside of AI’
item.description: Eisman said if you erase AI infrastructure spending from projected U.S. GDP growth for 2025, the economic picture exposes a struggling consumer.
